description.p: Glance is a next-generation Linux system utility that combines monitoring, cleaning, and optimization into one stunning application. Built with Tauri v2 and Svelte 5, it delivers a native-like experience with a modern glassmorphism UI.

ul.li: System Dashboard: Real-time overview of CPU, Memory, Disk, and Network
Resource Monitor: Live performance graphs with historical data
System Cleaner: Safely reclaim disk space by cleaning caches and logs
Package Manager: Manage installed packages and dependencies
Repository Manager: Manage mirrors and PPAs with speed testing
